title: Deploy application to the Internet Computer

requirements.text: Deploy the AP Insight News application (backend Motoko canister and frontend React app) to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible via a live URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister is deployed and running on the Internet Computer network.
The frontend is built and uploaded as an asset canister on the Internet Computer network.
The application is accessible via a public ICP URL (e.g., https://<canister-id>.icp0.io).
All existing features (homepage, political news, movie news, article detail, admin page, authentication) work correctly on the deployed version.
Internet Identity authentication functions correctly on the live deployment.

constraints: Do not modify any existing application logic, UI, or backend data model during deployment.
Preserve all existing frontend immutable paths as defined in the system context.
nonGoals: Adding new features or UI changes as part of this deployment.
Deploying to any cloud provider other than the Internet Computer (no AWS, GCP, Azure, Vercel, etc.).
Changing authentication mechanisms or backend schema.
